TopicTitle: Anyone have a link to all of the little hidden controls in the editor and what not?

Articles.Content:
Like the one I remember is when using the offset tool for items, how to change the directions you can move the object from absolute to relative to whatever its placed on (In and out is in and out toward a fuel tank) 

There was also a key to switch from SPH to VAB mode am I correct??

The Wiki has a list of [keyboard controls](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Controls) which is absolutely invaluable!

And much other useful data as well.

Happy landings!
